plugin.name: OurAssistants Meeting Intelligence
plugin.description: Search and analyze meeting transcripts, VA check-ins, churn risks, and actionable suggestions for OurAssistants operations.

searchScenarios.name: Find VA Status
searchScenarios.description: Search for current status and recent check-ins for a specific VA
exampleQueries: What is the status of VA Jep?
Show me recent check-ins for Ivana
searchScenarios.filter: document_type eq 'va_status' or document_type eq 'va_checkin_analysis' or document_type eq 'meeting_transcript'

searchScenarios.name: Client Health Check
searchScenarios.description: Check health status and concerns for a specific client
exampleQueries: What are the concerns with Prime Properties?
Show me client health for all at-risk accounts

searchScenarios.name: Churn Risk Analysis
searchScenarios.description: Identify and analyze churn risks for VAs and clients
exampleQueries: Which VAs are at high churn risk?
What are the top churn risks this week?
searchScenarios.filter: document_type eq 'churn_risk' or risk_level eq 'high' or risk_level eq 'critical'

searchScenarios.name: Pending Actions
searchScenarios.description: Find pending suggestions and action items that need attention

searchScenarios.name: Meeting History
searchScenarios.description: Search through meeting transcripts and check-ins
exampleQueries: What was discussed in the last check-in with Jep?
Show me all onboarding meetings this month
Find meetings where communication issues were raised

searchScenarios.name: Best Practices
searchScenarios.description: Find approved solutions and best practices from past cases
exampleQueries: What worked for similar issues before?
Show me approved solutions for communication problems
What are the best practices for VA engagement?
searchScenarios.filter: document_type eq 'approved_solution' or tags/any(t: t eq 'best_practice')

va.description: Virtual Assistant records and status updates

client.description: Client account records and health status

churn_risk.description: Identified churn risks with recommended actions

riskSummary.description: Aggregate risk levels across VAs and clients

suggestionStatus.description: Summary of suggestions by status and urgency

promptGuidance.systemPrompt: You are an AI assistant for OurAssistants operations team. You help analyze meeting transcripts, track VA and client health, identify churn risks, and surface actionable insights. When searching, prioritize recent data and high-risk items. Always include specific names, dates, and actionable recommendations in your responses.
